abstract: Prosecution rests its case in trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, admitted Boston Marathon bomber, after describing in gruesome detail the death of 8-year-old Martin Richard; Tsarnaev has been indicted on 30 counts, 17 of which carry death penalty.
lead_paragraph: The prosecution describes the deaths of an 8-year-old boy and a 23-year-old woman.

headline.main: Prosecution in Boston Marathon Trial Closes With Raw Details of Killings
headline.print_headline: Prosecution in Boston Marathon Trial Closes With Raw Details of Killings

snippet: The prosecution describes the deaths of an 8-year-old boy and a 23-year-old woman.
